title: Can anyone disclose the closing ranks for both the campuses for cse and ece after the first round counselling

comments.body: Idk bout the rest but I'm pretty sure CSE at RR closed at around 840
You would get it in the second round right?
Cse rr shut off at 846
Highly possible yes‚Ä¶but if many ppl who missed counselling today show up next round, then probably not
CSE at EC Campus closed at 2431
Bruh..I just came from there..I too got CSE in EC campus. That head guy almost convinced my father to let me take ai ml but I didn't take..I took CSE in EC campus too
Really bruh?? I left when 130 seats were left and ranks went upto 1800
There's a big blunder done by most ig. Most of them thought to join directly in second round. In my batch 1200-2400..Only 472 came
perhaps the turnout was low
ECE RR closed at 2977
Any idea about closing rank of aiml?

1400 something
This resulted in CSE in EC campus going around 2.4k(second batch had 472/1200 attendance consequently the high cutoff ig)
Are we talking abt the bald man screaming into the mic at random intervals?

https://postimg.cc/c63vjGkC

These were the ranks when I came back after getting the admission done.
Yup
And kept saying per se lol
Also ‚Äúlotta‚Äù
Hey bro! You remember me? We used to talk about getting CSE in PESU a few days back on this sub reddit..Did you get it?
Don't join pes , it's a nightmare just join some other decent college
Yeah I member you. What a joke dude, the cutoff was like 2400. I easily got it
Actually the cutoff wasn't really 2400. It went upto that cuz only 472 people came. I though everyone will take cse at ec campus but some took AIML too and most people were there after my rank
In round 2 are you planning on upgrading to aiml, or have you decided on cs in ec campus
AI ML is too risky bro..New batch from this year..
Why is it a blunder? Most people want only cse rr. And in your batch none of them would have gotten it.

Hey, to everyone who attended the counselling and selected a seat - have you recieved any email/confirmation? My rank was 2379 and it was a huge, huge surprise to get cse in ec campus. Now I'm paranoid and sort of freaking out since there isn't any written confirmation and I have NO other options anywhere else this year. 

(The person doing the counselling *did* say the seat is confirmed like she did to everyone who selected a seat, and I've taken an ss of my name under the 'seat selection completed')
Hey, have you recieved any official confirmation or email post selection?
Yup. I tried counting the number of times he said ‚Äúper se‚Äù but I lost count after the fiftieth time per se
Chill bro you made itüëç
A little too late but yeah I've got it. I attended the offline counselling though
